nodes.text: An armory existed within the Jedi Temple on the Galactic Republic capital planet of Coruscant in the waning years of the Jedi Order. Within the armory was the Black Vault, the Order's storage place for Sith weapons. By 19 BBY, the Jedi Master Mace Windu recorded in a section of Sorzus Syn's chronicle on Sith weaponry that he placed the Tzuhakk broadsword in the Jedi armory's Black Vault after retrieving the blade from the Outer Rim world of Bpfassh.
The Jedi Temple armory was mentioned in Book of Sith: Secrets from the Dark Side, a reference book authored by Daniel Wallace that was published by becker&mayer! in 2012.
